bug.author: ivanst0
bug.summary: onnxruntime-gpu package not available for Python 3.8 on Windows
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://pypi.org/project/onnxruntime-gpu/1.5.2/#files>PyPI index</denchmark-link> offers both Linux and Windows edition of onnxruntime-gpu package for Python 3.5/3.6/3.7, but only Linux edition is available for Python 3.8. Urgency For many teams this is the only blocker to upgrade to Python 3.8. System information
OS Platform and Distribution: Windows 10 ONNX Runtime installed from: PyPI ONNX Runtime version: 1.5.2 Python version: 3.8
Expected behavior If the Linux edition of a package is available for a particular version of Python, Windows edition should be available as well.
PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/onnxruntime/pull/5956>#5956</denchmark-link> enabled building onnxruntime-gpu package for Python 3.8 on Windows.
